instruction: Given a broad category, generate a trivia-type question based on a specific entity in that category. The question should be non-ambiguous. External resources such as Wikipedia could be used to obtain the facts.
output: Which of the core cast of the TV series Friends also appeared in the 2000 film The Whole Nine Yards with Bruce Willis?, Whose name was licensed in 2014 for cannabis products, anticipating a market of $10bn?, To which actress is Daniel Craig married?, David Furnish, Canadian filmmaker and former advertising executive is the husband of which performer?, The composer Frdric Chopin had a decade-long affair with which French author?, Gwen Stefani had a 2005 hit with Rich Girl featuring who?

instruction: Given a broad category, generate a trivia-type question based on a specific entity in that category. The question should be non-ambiguous. External resources such as Wikipedia could be used to obtain the facts.
output: Caliban is a moon that orbits which planet?, Callisto and Io are moons of which planet?, Callisto and Io are moons that orbit which planet?, 'Atlas', 'Mimas' and 'Calypso' are three of the satellites of which planet?, Which constellation, that lies between Cancer and Virgo, contains the stars called Regulus, Denebola, Regulus, Wolf 359, Gliese 436, and Algieba?, Which sign of the zodiac comes between Scorpio and Capricorn?, Sinope and Carme are two satellites of which planet?, Carpo and Elara are moons of which planet?, Who is the wife of King Cepheus, found opposite to him in the night sky?, Charon is a moon which orbits which body?, What has a moon named Charon?, Which planet has one moon called Charon?, Were he alive in 2006, the American astronomer Clyde Tombaugh would have been disappointed as his discovery was 'dwarfed.' What did he discover in 1930?, Clyde Tonbaugh discovered what planet in 1930?, Which heavenly body was discovered by astronomer Clyde W Tombaugh on 18 February 1930?, Deimos is a moon of which planet?, Phobos and Deimos are the moons of which planet?, Phobos and Deimos are the only two moons of what planet?, Deneb is the brightest star of which constellation?, In which constellation is the bright star Deneb?, In which constellation is the star Deneb?, Of which planet is'Desdemona' a satellite?, Despina and Larissa orbit which planet?, Despina and Proteus are moons orbiting which planet of the solar system?, Sirius otherwise known as the Dog Star can be found in which constellation?, What passes between the sun and earth to make a solar eclipse?, What is the nearest star to the Earth?, What star is closest to the Earth?, Encleadus is a moon of which planet?, Callisto, Europa, Ganymede and Io are 4 of the 16 moons of which planet?, Europa and Ganymede are moons of which planet?, What is the name of the galaxy that contains the Earth?, Ganymede is the largest moon in the solar system, around which planet does it orbit?, If Jupiter has the Great Red Spot, which planet has the Great Dark Spot?, Which planet has a Great Dark Spot?, Where would you find the Great Red Spot?, Which planet has a 'great red spot'?, Which planet in our solar system was discovered by Johann Galle and Heinrich D'Arrest in 1846?, Herse and Kale are moons of which planet?
